00108             function                delete_dependent_objects( $Object1Id , $Object2Id , $Object1Type , 
00109                                                                                                                         $Object2Type , $Accessors = array() )
00110             {
00111                   try
00112                   {
00113                         $Links = $this->Link->get_links( $Object1Id , $Object2Id , $Object1Type , $Object2Type );
00114                         if( isset( $Links[ 0 ] ) )
00115                         {
00116                               $LinksTypes = get_field_ex( $Links , 'type' );
00117                               $LinksTypes = $this->Link->get_link_literal_type( $LinksTypes );
00118                               $LinksTypes = array_unique( get_field_ex( $LinksTypes , 'object2_type' ) );
00119                               foreach( $LinksTypes as $i => $LinkType )
00120                               {
00121                                     if( isset( $Accessors[ $LinkType ] ) )
00122                                     {
00123                                           call_user_func_array( 
00124                                                 array( $Accessors[ $LinkType ] , 'delete' ) , 
00125                                                 array( 
00126                                                       get_field_cond( $Links , 'object2_id' , '$Element->object2_type=="'.$LinkType.'"' )
00127                                                 )
00128                                           );
00129                                     }
00130                               }
00131                               
00132                               $this->Link->delete_link( $Object1Id , $Object2Id , $Object1Type , $Object2Type );
00133                         }
00134                   }
00135                   catch( Exception $e )
00136                   {
00137                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00138                   }
00139             }
00140             
00179             function                get_dependent_objects( $MasterId , $MasterType , $ObjectType , $Access = false )
00180             {
00181                   try
00182                   {
00183                         $MasterId = $this->Security->get( $MasterId , 'integer' );
00184                         $MasterType = $this->Security->get( $MasterType , 'command' );
00185                         
00186                         $ids = array( 0 );
00187                         $Links = $this->Link->get_links( $MasterId , false , $MasterType , $ObjectType );
00188                         
00189                         if( isset( $Links[ 0 ] ) )
00190                         {
00191                               $ids = get_field_ex( $Links , 'object2_id' );
00192                         }
00193                         
00194                         if( $Access === false )
00195                         {
00196                               return( $ids );
00197                         }
00198                         else
00199                         {
00200                               return( $Access->select_list( implode( ',' , $ids ) ) );
00201                         }
00202                   }
00203                   catch( Exception $e )
00204                   {
00205                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00206                   }
00207             }
00208             
00239             function                dependent_objects_exist( $MasterId , $MasterType , $ObjectType )
00240             {
00241                   try
00242                   {
00243                         $MasterId = $this->Security->get( $MasterId , 'integer' );
00244                         $MasterType = $this->Security->get( $MasterType , 'command' );
00245                         
00246                         $ids = $this->get_dependent_objects( $MasterId , $MasterType , $ObjectType );
00247                         
00248                         return( isset( $ids[ 0 ] ) && $ids[ 0 ] );
00249                   }
00250                   catch( Exception $e )
00251                   {
00252                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );

00294             function                get_master_objects( $ObjectId , $MasterType , $ObjectType , $Access = false )
00295             {
00296                   try
00297                   {
00298                         $ObjectId = $this->Security->get( $ObjectId , 'integer' );
00299                         $MasterType = $this->Security->get( $MasterType , 'command' );

00304                         if( isset( $Links[ 0 ] ) )
00305                         {
00306                               $ids = get_field_ex( $Links , 'object1_id' );

00310                         {

00397             function                trasform_master_parameters( $MasterId , $MasterType )
00398             {
00399                   try
00400                   {
00401                         $MasterType = $this->Security->get( $MasterType , 'command' );
00402                         
00403                         if( $MasterId === false && $MasterType == 'user' )
00404                         {
00405                               $MasterId = $this->UserAlgorithms->get_id();
00406                         }
00407                         
00408                         $MasterId = $this->Security->get( $MasterId , 'integer' );
00409                         
00410                         return( array( $MasterId , $MasterType ) );
00411                   }
00412                   catch( Exception $e )
00413                   {
00414                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00415                   }
00416             }
